fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.hairdryer

Class HairDryer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.hairdryer.HairDryer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, HairDryerImplementationI

    public class HairDryer
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements HairDryerImplementationI
    The class HairDryer implements the hair dryer component.

    Description

    The hair dryer is an uncontrollable appliance, hence it does not connect with the household energy manager. However, it will connect later to the electric panel to take its (simulated) electricity consumption into account.

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       INITIAL_STATE != null
 invariant       INITIAL_MODE != null
 invariant       currentState != null
 invariant       currentMode != null

    Invariants

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
